description:
Caught in the rain, Kashiwada gets sick, which leads to an encounter between Oota and her brother.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Caring for the Sick Kashiwada-san / Kashiwada-san`s Older Brother / Kashiwada-san and Oota-kun and Ice Cream
Kashiwada-san no Kanbyou / Kashiwada-san no Onii-chan / Kashiwada-san to Oota-kun to Ice
柏田さんの看病 / 柏田さんのお兄ちゃん / 柏田さんと太田君とアイス
